text: ثُمَّ لۡيَقۡضُواْ تَفَثَهُمۡ وَلۡيُوفُواْ نُذُورَهُمۡ وَلۡيَطَّوَّفُواْ بِٱلۡبَيۡتِ ٱلۡعَتِيقِ

translation.en: Then let them end their untidiness and fulfill their vows and perform Tawaf around the ancient House
translation.id: (Kemudian, hendaklah mereka menghilangkan kotoran543) (yang ada di badan) mereka, menyempurnakan nazar-nazar mereka dan melakukan tawaf sekeliling rumah tua (Baitullah)
